name: Illusion (itch) (Wikite)
description:
This game was made in 2 days for Koder Jam with the theme "Illusion" DOWNLOAD FOR BETTER QUALITY READ ALL BEFORE PLAYING: Controls:

Move: WSAD

Jump: Space

Shoot: LMB

Crouch: C

Sprint: Shift

Switch Worlds: Tab

How to play?

-Pick up orbs to get cards.

-With cards you can damage the hat in order to win.

-Have fun!

Plot:

You have been kidnapped by a crazy illusionist. During his performance, he put you in a strange world as his trick. The only way to get out is to defeat his hat in less than 75 seconds! If you fail, you will have to be here FOREVER!
